name: Pack Flanking

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, ability to acquire an animal companion.

sections.text: When you and your companion creature have this feat, your companion creature is adjacent to you or sharing your square, and you both threaten the same opponent, you are considered to be flanking that opponent, regardless of your actual positioning.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You must be positioned opposite an ally to flank an opponent.
sections.name: Normal

prerequisites: ability to acquire an animal companion
description: You and your companion creature are adept at fighting together against foes.
